text:
@replouiegohmert Do you realize that you may die from #COVID19 because you are older

Is this your legacy? Lying, scapegoating & deflection? This cowardly nonsense is what you want to be known for?

I see you are ashamed of your behavior. It is in your voice, on your face

Now be honest w/us https://t.co/4IebcNHh7y
